title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a pot of salted boiling water until al dente.
In a separate pan, cook the pancetta until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and cheeses together in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and mix with the pancetta. Remove from heat.
Quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture, stirring constantly to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and freshly ground black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: A popular Indian dish with marinated chicken in a creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, garam masala, cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, and salt for at least 1 hour.
Cook the chicken in a pan until browned and set aside.
In the same pan, sauté the onion and garlic in butter until softened.
Add tomato puree and cook for a few minutes.
Add the cream and return the chicken to the pan. Simmer until the sauce thickens.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (430°F).
Roll out the pizza dough and place it on a baking sheet.
Spread the tomato sauce over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
Top with slices of mozzarella and a sprinkle of salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Remove from the oven and top with fresh basil leaves and a drizzle of olive oil. Serve immediately.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A crisp salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and a creamy Caesar dressing.
instructions: In a large bowl, toss the lettuce with the Caesar dressing and lemon juice.
Add the croutons and parmesan cheese, and toss again.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.

title: Guacamole
summary: A creamy dip made with mashed avocados, lime juice, and seasonings.
instructions: Mash the avocados in a bowl until smooth.
Add lime juice, red onion, cilantro, and tomato.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.
ingredients: Maple syrup and berries, for serving
instructions: In a bowl, mix the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk the buttermilk, egg, and melted butter.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with maple syrup and fresh berries.

title: French Onion Soup
summary: A rich and flavorful soup made with caramelized onions and topped with melted cheese.
instructions: In a large pot, melt the butter and add the onions. Cook on low heat until caramelized, about 30 minutes.
Stir in the flour and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add the white wine and cook until reduced by half.
Add the beef broth and thyme, and simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Ladle the soup into bowls, top with baguette slices and grated cheese.
Broil in the oven until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Serve hot.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Ground beef seasoned with spices, served in tortillas with toppings.
instructions: Cook the ground beef and onion in a pan until browned.
Add cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, and salt. Cook for another 2 minutes.
Warm the tortillas in a separate pan.
Assemble the tacos with the beef mixture and desired toppings.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

title: Butter Chicken
summary: A creamy and mildly spiced Indian chicken curry dish.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, cumin, turmeric, chili powder, and salt for 1 hour.
Cook the chicken in a pan until browned and set aside.
In the same pan, melt the butter and sauté the onion, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add tomato puree, cream, garam masala, and cook until the sauce thickens.
Return the chicken to the pan and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caprese Salad
summary: A fresh Italian salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Arrange the tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.

title: Baked Salmon
summary: A simple baked salmon fillet with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Place the salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with foil.
Drizzle with olive oil and top with lemon slices, garlic, dill, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through.
Serve with a side of vegetables or rice.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and garlic.
instructions: Heat oil in a large pan or wok over high heat.
Add the garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add the broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, and snow peas.
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add the soy sauce and season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately with cooked rice.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies with crispy edges and a soft, chewy center.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugars.
Beat in the eggs and vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until combined.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Cool on a wire rack before serving.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, and olives.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Top with crumbled feta cheese and serve immediately.

title: Tom Yum Soup
summary: A spicy and sour Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, and lemongrass.
instructions: Bring the chicken broth to a boil in a large pot.
Add lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, fish sauce, lime juice, and chili peppers.
Add the mushrooms and tomato, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the shrimp and cook until they turn pink.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot.

title: Egg Fried Rice
summary: A quick and easy fried rice dish with eggs and vegetables.
instructions: Heat the oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add the eggs and scramble until cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Add the mixed vegetables to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add the cooked rice and soy sauce, and stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
Return the scrambled eggs to the pan and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with green onions. Serve hot.

title: Bruschetta
summary: Toasted bread topped with a mixture of tomatoes, garlic, and basil.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Brush the baguette slices with olive oil and toast in the oven for 5-7 minutes.
In a bowl, combine the tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spoon the tomato mixture onto the toasted baguette slices.
Serve immediately.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A classic Thai noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, and a tangy sauce.
instructions: Cook the rice noodles according to package instructions and set aside.
In a bowl, mix the fish sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar.
Heat the oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add the tofu and shrimp, and cook until the shrimp is pink.
Push the shrimp and tofu to one side of the pan, and add the eggs. Scramble until cooked.
Add the noodles and sauce mixture to the pan, and toss to combine.
Stir in the bean sprouts and green onions.
Serve with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.

title: Margarita
summary: A classic cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur.
instructions: Rim a glass with salt and fill it with ice.
In a shaker, combine the tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur with ice.
Shake well and strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

title: Miso Soup
summary: A traditional Japanese soup made with miso paste, tofu, and seaweed.
instructions: Bring the dashi broth to a simmer in a pot.
Dissolve the miso paste in a small amount of warm broth, then add to the pot.
Add the tofu and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add the green onions and nori strips.
Serve hot.
